TEI.2.document_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 843
TEI.2.document_title: Horatio Chriesman to Stephen F Austin, 08-16-1832 [?]

barker_notes.barker_summary: Horatio Chriesman to Austin, August 16, 1832. Concerning supplies for Piedras's troops.
barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 843

text.body:
*div1 type="summary"* *p*Horatio Chriesman to Austin, August 16, 1832. Concerning supplies for Piedras's troops.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p*I have just been favored with your official note of this day transmitting to me a copy of *person_mentioned*Mr. James Bowie*/person_mentioned*'s letter to you from the *location_mentioned*Angelina*/location_mentioned**/p*
*p*The *location_mentioned*municipality */location_mentioned*at this time is entirely destitute of any public funds whereby aid might be promptly furnished to the*person_mentioned* troops of the 12th Batallon*/person_mentioned* that formerly garisoned *location_mentioned*Nacogdoches*/location_mentioned*— Nevertheless on account of the great importance that succor should be promptly furnished them as also in compliance with my duty— I have appointed a *person_mentioned*Commissioner */person_mentioned*to proceed to *person_mentioned*Mr. Roman*/person_mentioned*'s Comisario of the *location_mentioned*precinct of Viesca*/location_mentioned* and in conjunction with that *person_mentioned*officer*/person_mentioned* to afford every aid that may be practicable, and which I hope may be sufficient to meet their present wants.*/p*
*p*God and Liberty *person_mentioned*Austin */person_mentioned*[August?] 16 1832*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Horatio Chriesman*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p*[Addressed:] To *person_mentioned*Col Stephen Austin Commander of the Militia of *location_mentioned*Austin*/location_mentioned**/person_mentioned**/p*
*/div1*
